sentences.en: In addition, we also carry out a preliminary survey of coeval fossil plants from the same locations and present potential plant candidates which might have been involved in insect interactions.
sentences.cn: 另外，作者对采自同一层位的同时代的植物化石进行了初步研究并介绍了可能涉及到与昆虫相互作用的代表性植物。

sentences.en: Tang Xianzu, a playwright of Ming Dynasty in 16th Century, was the coeval of Shakespeare of Britain.
sentences.cn: 16世纪明代的汤显祖与英国的莎士比亚是同时代人。

sentences.en: The coeval of sushi afterwards and personage began to spread the creation form of "he tao shi".
sentences.cn: 苏轼同时代及其后的文人士子，开始对“和陶诗”这一创作形式加以推广。

sentences.en: The excursion will focus on Late Pleistocene loess-palaeosol sequences in the area and the differentiation of coeval lithostratigraphic units.
sentences.cn: 野外考察重点考察在晚更新世黄土—古土壤序列及同时期不同岩性地层单位间的差异。

sentences.en: The industry is coeval with the construction of the first railways.
sentences.cn: 这一产业和初期铁路的建造相伴而生。

trans.tran_cn: 同年代的， 同时代的， 同年龄的， 同时期的
trans.tran_en: of or belonging to the same age or generation
